hero.title: Software Engineer & Computer Science Graduate
hero.description: A passionate software engineer with experience at Genetec and Matrox, specializing in software development, mobile applications, and innovative solutions.

description: Train AI in Mathematics, Geography, and Sociology.
Serve as a French Technical Writer and Fact Checker across all dialects.
Act as an Arabic Technical Writer and Fact Checker covering various dialects.

communilink.title: Managing Director & Lead Software Engineer
description: Led the development of a cross-platform mobile app using Flutter and Firebase for emergency notifications.
Directed a team of 4 to enhance software functionality, security, and user experience.

genetec.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed secure C# and SQL code in a cybersecurity-focused environment.
Collaborated with the Ktulu team, strengthening teamwork and problem-solving skills.

matrox.title: Applications Engineer Intern
description: Developed high-performance applications in C#, ReactJS, Java, and C++, integrating APIs for device control.
Troubleshot hardware and software issues, showcasing effective solutions to customers.

maville.title: MaVille
maville.description: Cross-platform app enhancing communication between municipalities and residents
details: Spearheaded development of a cross-platform app to enhance communication between municipalities and residents.
Implemented real-time request tracking, interactive city maps, and customizable notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging.
Developed an intuitive UI and led training/support initiatives for municipal staff.
Integrated an AI chatbot to assist citizens with municipal inquiries.

about.title: About
about.summaryText: Highly motivated technology professional with a strong academic foundation in Computer Science from Concordia University and practical experience from internships at Genetec and Matrox.
